moonsound

Korean: 문사운드

Country:

South Korea

Blood type:

Introduction

moonsound is a South Korean singer who debuted independently on February 12, 2015, with Give Me A Chance featuring Kim Jiseok. She’s currently under h1BLE Records since October 2019.

active
